Name: Custodian's Bastion
Description: Increases Armor by 1 per 2% of active SHIELD. Max 100 Bonus Armor.
Location: Withered Necropolis (N'erud);Exclusive to The Dark Horizon DLC;Talk to The Gardener after defeating Alepsis-Taura to learn more about the Dryzr and himself. After the conversation, the ring will be on the ground for you to pick up.
